<<<<<<< HEAD
A sermon preached on Munday, the seauenteenth of March, at Westminster at the opening of the Parliament. By the Bishop of Bathe and Welles. Laud, William, 1573-1645.
[2], 45, [1] p.
Printed [by B. Norton and J. Bill] for Richard Badger, London : 1628.
The Bishop of Bathe and Welles = William Laud. Printers' names from STC. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
